feed.title: LF-Air
feed.subtitle: RSS feed based on RSS and LLM.

entry.title: Vite report on Fri, 17 Nov 2023 08:03:51
entry.summary:
Tech:
- AI Training AI: GatorTronGPT at the Forefront of University of Florida’s Medical AI Innovations
- Google News removing magazines, including the ones you paid for, in December
- Show HN: Tiny LLMs – Browser-based private AI models for a wide array of tasks
- Using your iPhone to start your car is about to get a lot easier
- Twitch launches Privacy Center to educate users about their personal data
- The Future of Project Management: Leveraging AI to Streamline Operations and Enhance Communication
- Building the Future: A Beginner's Guide to Software Development (Write your experiences in the comments)
- IBM Shares AI Strategy And A Wealth Of Customer AI Results

Business:
- Business banking interest rates vs. personal banking interest rates: Which are better?
- Best Money Market Accounts for November 2023 (Earn up to 5.46%)
- PNC Bank mortgage review: Choose from a variety of loan types, but you'll need a decent credit score
- Fairway Independent Mortgage Corporation review: Affordable renovation loans and other mortgage options
- Citibank mortgage review: Affordable option for those who want a more guided lending experience
- Car dealership stocks tank after Amazon says it's launching online vehicle sales in 2024
- US stocks end mixed as November rally stumbles amid fresh economic data
- TJ Maxx is no longer just a secret dumping ground for brands
- Bond markets could see 'mini boom-bust cycles' as global government debt to soar by $5 trillion a year

Key Points:
- Researchers rediscovered a spiky, beaked echidna named after Sir David Attenborough that hasn't been seen for 60 years and was thought to be extinct.
- A top Tesla investor said he plans to ditch his Model Y for a Rivian after Elon Musk agreed with antisemitic post.
- Trump's expert accountant couldn't even ballpark it when asked what he's charging for his testimony.
- Facebook cofounder calls on Elon Musk to resign after Tesla CEO calls antisemitic tweet 'the actual truth'.
- An appeals court lifted Trump's gag order, clearing the way for him to insult the judge's staff again.
- EFF to Supreme Court: Fifth Amendment Protects People from Being Forced to Enter or Hand Over Cell Phone Passcodes to the Police.
- Government Unsure How Many Pedestrians Have Been Hit by Self-Driving Cars.

Insights:
- The interest rates for business banking and personal banking are compared to determine which is better.
- The rediscovery of the spiky, beaked echidna named after Sir David Attenborough highlights the importance of conservation efforts.
- The availability of high-yield money market accounts in November 2023 provides opportunities for earning higher returns.
- Maintaining an excellent credit score is crucial for accessing favorable loan options.
- The preference for Rivian over Tesla by a top investor raises concerns about Tesla's reputation.
- The lifting of Trump's gag order allows for potential further controversy and insults.
- The use of AI in various fields, such as medical innovations and project management, showcases its potential for streamlining operations and enhancing communication.
- The impact of AI on software development and the need for diverse perspectives in the field are discussed.
- The protection of personal data and privacy is emphasized with the launch of Twitch's Privacy Center.
- The legal implications of forced entry or handover of cell phone passcodes are debated.
- The uncertainty surrounding pedestrian safety in relation to self-driving cars raises questions about their widespread adoption.
- The growth of global government debt could lead to volatile boom-bust cycles in bond markets.
